mapper.select: select * from bes_ddc where F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name = #{f_psys_name})) || F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name = #{f_psys_name})))
SELECT F_PSYS_NAME FROM bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME = (SELECT F_PSYS_NAME FROM bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME = #{fSysName} )
SELECT * FROM bes_module where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = #{f_sys_name}

select * from bes_ddc where F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = #{old_f_sys_name} || F_SYS_NAME=#{old_f_sys_name}) || F_SYS_NAME= (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = #{old_f_sys_name} || F_SYS_NAME=#{old_f_sys_name})))) || F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = #{old_f_sys_name} || F_SYS_NAME=#{old_f_sys_name})))))

select * from bes_ddc where F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME = #{f_sys_name})))) || F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = #{f_sys_name} || F_SYS_NAME=#{f_sys_name})))))
select * from bes_ddc where F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name = #{f_sys_name}))

select * from bes_ddc where F_SYS_NAME = (SELECT F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD= (SELECT F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD= (SELECT F_SYS_NAME_OLD FROM bes_sbpz_struct q where q.F_SYS_NAME_OLD =#{f_psys_name}))) || F_SYS_NAME = (SELECT F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME_OLD= (SELECT F_SYS_NAME_OLD FROM bes_sbpz_struct q where q.F_SYS_NAME_OLD =#{f_psys_name}))

(select * from bes_ddc where F_SYS_NAME = (SELECT F_PSYS_NAME FROM bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME = #{f_psys_name})) UNION ALL (select * from bes_ddc where F_SYS_NAME = (SELECT F_PSYS_NAME FROM bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME = (SELECT F_PSYS_NAME FROM bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME = #{f_psys_name}))) UNION ALL (select * from bes_ddc where F_SYS_NAME = #{f_psys_name})
select max(CAST(F_SBID as SIGNED)) as F_SBID from bes_sbpz_struct where F_PSYS_NAME = #{f_psys_name}
select * from bes_module where F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name_old = #{f_sys_name} || f_sys_name= #{f_sys_name})
select * from bes_module where F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name_OLD = #{f_sys_name} )

SELECT tb.*,bm.F_TYPE,bss.F_TYPE as B_TYPE FROM ${tabName} tb left join bes_sbpz_struct bss on bss.f_sys_name_old = tb.f_sys_name_old left join bes_module bm on bm.f_sys_name_old = bss.F_PSYS_NAME where tb.F_SYS_NAME_OLD = #{f_sys_name} || tb.F_SYS_NAME = #{f_sys_name}

SELECT tb.*,bm.F_TYPE,bss.F_TYPE as B_TYPE FROM ${tabName} tb left join bes_sbpz_struct bss on bss.f_sys_name_old = tb.f_sys_name_old left join bes_module bm on bm.f_sys_name_old = bss.F_PSYS_NAME where tb.F_SYS_NAME = #{f_sys_name} || tb.F_SYS_NAME_OLD=#{f_sys_name}

SELECT tb.*,bm.F_TYPE,bss.F_TYPE as B_TYPE,bss.F_NODE_ATTRIBUTION FROM ${tabNameDO} tb left join bes_sbpz_struct bss on bss.f_sys_name = tb.f_sys_name left join bes_module bm on bm.f_sys_name = bss.F_PSYS_NAME where tb.F_GUID = #{DO}

SELECT tb.*,bm.F_TYPE,bss.F_TYPE as B_TYPE,bss.F_NODE_ATTRIBUTION FROM ${tabNameDI} tb left join bes_sbpz_struct bss on bss.f_sys_name = tb.f_sys_name left join bes_module bm on bm.f_sys_name = bss.F_PSYS_NAME where tb.F_GUID = #{DI}

SELECT tb.*,bm.F_TYPE,bss.F_TYPE as B_TYPE,bss.F_NODE_ATTRIBUTION FROM ${tabNameAO} tb left join bes_sbpz_struct bss on bss.f_sys_name = tb.f_sys_name left join bes_module bm on bm.f_sys_name = bss.F_PSYS_NAME where tb.F_GUID = #{AO}

SELECT tb.*,bm.F_TYPE,bss.F_TYPE as B_TYPE,bss.F_NODE_ATTRIBUTION FROM ${tabNameAI} tb left join bes_sbpz_struct bss on bss.f_sys_name = tb.f_sys_name left join bes_module bm on bm.f_sys_name = bss.F_PSYS_NAME where tb.F_GUID = #{AI}

SELECT tb.*,bm.F_TYPE,bss.F_TYPE as B_TYPE,bss.F_NODE_ATTRIBUTION FROM ${tabNameDDC} tb left join bes_sbpz_struct bss on bss.f_sys_name = tb.f_sys_name left join bes_module bm on bm.f_sys_name = bss.F_PSYS_NAME where tb.F_GUID = #{DDC}

SELECT tb.*,bm.F_TYPE,bss.F_TYPE as B_TYPE,bss.F_NODE_ATTRIBUTION FROM ${tabNamemodule} tb left join bes_sbpz_struct bss on bss.f_sys_name = tb.f_sys_name left join bes_module bm on bm.f_sys_name = bss.F_PSYS_NAME where tb.F_GUID = #{module}

SELECT tb.*,bm.F_TYPE,bss.F_TYPE as B_TYPE,bss.F_NODE_ATTRIBUTION FROM ${tabNamecollector} tb left join bes_sbpz_struct bss on bss.f_sys_name = tb.f_sys_name left join bes_module bm on bm.f_sys_name = bss.F_PSYS_NAME where tb.F_GUID = #{collector}
SELECT * from bes_sbpz_struct where f_id=#{xh_id}
SELECT * from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name=#{f_sys_name}
SELECT * from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name_old=#{f_sys_name_ammeter}
SELECT * from ${tabNameammeter} where f_guid=#{all}
select * from bes_ddc where F_SYS_NAME = #{f_psys_name}
select * from bes_ddc where F_SYS_NAME = (SELECT F_PSYS_NAME FROM bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME = (SELECT F_PSYS_NAME FROM bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME = #{f_psys_name}))

select * from bes_ddc where F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name_old = #{old_f_sys_name} || f_sys_name = #{old_f_sys_name}))
select * from bes_ddc where F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_ID = #{f_id}))

SELECT * from bes_ddc where F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name_old = #{f_sys_name})))
select F_SYS_NAME,F_PSYS_NAME,F_TYPE from bes_sbpz_struct where F_PSYS_NAME in ( select F_SYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_PSYS_NAME = #{pSysName} )
select F_SYS_NAME,F_PSYS_NAME,F_TYPE from bes_sbpz_struct where F_SYS_NAME in ( select F_SYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where F_PSYS_NAME = #{pSysName} )
select COUNT(*) from ${tabName} where F_SYS_NAME_OLD= #{f_sys_name}
SELECT tb.* FROM bes_sbpz_struct tb where tb.f_sys_name = #{f_sys_name} || tb.f_sys_name_old = #{f_sys_name}

select ai.F_STATICSTIME,ai.F_SYS_NAME,ai.F_SBID,sb.F_PSYS_NAME from bes_analog_input ai left join bes_sbpz_struct sb on ai.f_sys_name = sb.f_sys_name where ai.F_ENERGYSTATICS = "0" AND ai.F_STATICSTIME = "0"

select ai.F_STATICSTIME,ai.F_SYS_NAME,ai.F_SBID,sb.F_PSYS_NAME from bes_analog_input ai left join bes_sbpz_struct sb on ai.f_sys_name = sb.f_sys_name where ai.F_ENERGYSTATICS = "0" AND ai.F_STATICSTIME = "1"

select ai.F_STATICSTIME,ai.F_SYS_NAME,ai.F_SBID,sb.F_PSYS_NAME from bes_analog_input ai left join bes_sbpz_struct sb on ai.f_sys_name = sb.f_sys_name where ai.F_ENERGYSTATICS = "0" AND ai.F_STATICSTIME = "2"
SELECT * from bes_sbpz_struct where F_PSYS_NAME = #{f_sys_name}
select * from bes_module where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = #{name}
select f_nick_name from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name_old = #{name}
select F_NODE_TABLE FROM bes_sbtree_nodetype where F_NODE_TYPE = #{f_type}
select * from ${tabName} where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = #{f_sys_name} || F_SYS_NAME = #{f_sys_name}
SELECT * from bes_sbpz_struct where F_PSYS_NAME = #{f_psys_name}
select F_TYPE from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name_old = #{f_sys_name}
SELECT * from bes_sbpz_struct where F_PSYS_NAME = #{f_psys_name}
select * from bes_vpoint where f_sys_name_old = #{name}
select * from bes_vpoint where f_sys_name = #{name}
select * from bes_module where F_SBID = #{f_sbid_module}
SELECT * from bes_sbpz_struct where F_PSYS_NAME = #{name}
select * from ${tabName} where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = #{pointName}

select * from bes_ddc where F_SYS_NAME = #{f_psys_name} || F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name = #{f_psys_name} )) || F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name = #{f_psys_name} )

select * from bes_ddc where F_SYS_NAME = #{fSysName} || F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name = #{fSysName} ))) || F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name = #{fSysName} )|| F_SYS_NAME = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name = (select F_PSYS_NAME from bes_sbpz_struct where f_sys_name = #{fSysName} ))
SELECT f_node_table from bes_sbtree_nodetype where F_NODE_TYPE = (SELECT f_type from bes_sbpz_struct where f_id = #{id})
select * from BES_VPOINT where F_SBID = #{id}
select * from ${tabName} where F_STRUCT_ID = #{id}
select F_TYPE_CODE from bes_module_type where F_ID = #{modelID}
select a.*,b.F_ALLPATH from bes_module_type a,bes_sbpz_struct b where a.F_ID = ( select f_type from bes_module where F_SYS_NAME_OLD = #{f_psys_name}) and b.F_SYS_NAME_OLD = #{f_psys_name}
